content: Esistono molte alternative al latte vaccino, come latte di capra, latte di mandorle, latte di cocco, latte di soia, latte di canapa e latte di riso.
translations: eng:There are many alternatives to cow milk, such as goat milk, almond milk, coconut milk, soy milk, hemp milk and rice milk
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
